trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Atmore
There were no other sightings in Atmore on or around May 30th 2009
Summary: Non-flashing bright light moving silently across the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI got out of my car at my mom's house, and walked up to her door...and noticed an object in the distance...See, Venus is very bright, and I thought this was Venus for a second, then noticed it was moving.I waited to hear the helicopter sounds, ( we have a local airport that does some kind of helicopter repair)...but there was none, and no flashing lights anywhere. This thing was moving towards the moon from the northwest in a southeast direction...when it got to about the point in the sky where the moon was, it made a kind of arc, then traveled back down that same line...and continued on to the southeast. I then noticed it get duller and duller, like it either "phased out", or kept going straight through the atmosphere. At 5:00 this morning(June 2, 2009), my wife heard a low hum with a kind of pulsing in it, that lasted for about a minute.She saw nothing, as it had her scared out of her wits.
